alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Cumberland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 27 at 2:55PM EST until December 31 at 9:16PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington NC has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Carolina... Cape Fear River At William O Huske Lock And Dam 3 affecting Cumberland and Bladen Counties. For the Cape Fear River...including William O Huske Lock And Dam 3, Elizabethtown, Lock And Dam 1...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cape Fear River at William O Huske Lock And Dam 3. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 47.0 feet, The access road for the wildlife boat ramp at Tar Heel Ferry Road may begin to flood. Lowland flooding along the river worsens along both sides of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 36.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 46.1 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Thursday morning.
